name: Link
description:
Allows you to place a layer as a linked image on another layer!

With Link you can place components or layers as an image on another layer, allowing you to update the image fill with one click - document wide on as many links as you want!

When would you use it?
When placing parts of your design on another part in the design - currently you can either make a component and scale it to fit (which doesnt always work) or Copy as PNG - doing that again and again becomes tedious - which is why this plugin was born.
